name: Parallel (itch) (Leol22)
description:
Puzzle game made for the BenBonk Game Jam #3

The theme was...

TWO SIDES!

This was very fun to make! I won't spoil the gimmick but you'll figure it out. Arrow keys to move and space to switch character.

CREDITS:

-Pallette, taken from the internet with the search of "32 color pallette" cuz Lospec was down.

-BeepBox, Jpixel, Construct 2, SFXR, the programs i used.

-Everything else was made by ya 13yo boi, so don't expect quality.
